Description: Great three- bedroom apartment in prime location with heat included in the rent! Hardwood floors, high ceilings, generously sized bedrooms and a study. Close to numerous neighborhood bistros, Whole Foods, Starbucks, downtown Boston, the MGH Institute in the Navy Yard, and the North End. Public transportation is very easy to access and includes the Orange Line and two bus routes. Very professionally run building. Available 9/15, 10/1 or sooner! This is a terrific, rare three-bedroom apartment on a great street that rents very quickly!! Easy to show.
